attributes.action: Leave GMT and BST as they are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its been said that moving to double double summer time as its called and adding an hour to our clocks will give us lighter nights and save energy. It won't save energy at all it will still be dark for the same ammount of time it alwyas is , street lights will still be on for the same time.Why do we need lighter nights ? its light till 10;30 in the summer, thats long enough,is the govenment going to supply blackout blinds for our childrens bedrooms? I think not.We don't need to be on the same time zone as europe for bussiness, we do bussiness with the USA and rest of the world ok.
